title: InfiniteTalk VideoGen
description: InfiniteTalk unlimited-length talking video generation with MAXIMUM QUALITY for RTX 6000 PRO (96GB VRAM). Supports 720p multi-person, image-to-video, and video-to-video generation with zero compromises. Window size 121, 6 inference steps, full resolution VAE, zero swapping.

gpuTypeId: NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition
NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Workstation Edition
NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Max-Q Workstation Edition
